comic.suffix: klarer Comic-Stil, saubere Outlines, kräftige Farben, flächig, minimal shading, lineart
comic.negative: realistic photo, photorealistic, human faces, abstract pattern, text watermark, low quality, blurry

instagram.suffix: plakativer Poster-Look, starke Kontraste, trendige Farben, clean background
instagram.negative: text watermark, frames, border, lowres, artifacts

kinderbuch.suffix: weiche Pastellfarben, sanfte Konturen, freundlicher Kinderbuch-Stil, einfache Formen
kinderbuch.negative: scary, horror, gore, dark, noisy, cluttered, text watermark, photorealistic
